description: Situated just outside Amalfi with the elegant Mediterranean landscapes of the Amalfi Coast as a backdrop, this fine-dining restaurant at the beautiful Santa Caterina hotel is perched above the sea...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Great view, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus, Terrace, Wheelchair access
creditCards: American Express credit card, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Diners Club credit card, Maestro, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
